item.title: Talks: 2023
item.description: Data of an Unusual Size: A practical guide to analysis and interactive visualization of massive datasets # PyCon US - 19th April # A ~3 hour tutorial on the fundaments of big data computation, from distributed computing with Dask to interactive visualization+dashboards with hvPlot+Panel. Read the compete tutorial abstract on the PyCon US website. I couldn’t attend PyCon because of visa-related issues. My co-presenter, Dharhas Pothina, presented the tutorial at the conference.

item.title: Talks: 2022
item.description: Scaling Data Science with Dask # PyData Delhi Meetup - 21st May My first in-person presentation since the pandemic! This is an introductory Dask tutorial for folks new to scalable computing. We cover the basics of parallel and distributed computing, talk about Dask + how Dask works, and check out the Dask DataFrame API. Recording: (will be added soon) Material: GitHub repo

item.title: Talks: 2021
item.description: Scaling Data Science with Dask # PyLadies Dublin Meetup - 17th November A 30-min talk about scalable computing and Dask. Recording: YouTube Material: GitHub repo Data Science and Machine Learning at Scale # Open Data Science Conference (APAC) - 15th September A 3-hour tutorial about scaling data science and machine learning workflows, to larger datasets and larger models, using Dask. Material: GitHub repo Abstract: Conference website Scalable Data Science with Dask # PyLadies Berlin Meetup - 6th April

item.title: Talks: 2020
item.description: Introduction to Data Visualization with Bokeh # PyLadies Hyderabad Meetup - 30st August Introductory workshop on data visualization with Bokeh. (My first hands-on session, ever!) Recording: YouTube Material: GitHub repo Writing a Winning Proposal # Women of Open Source Community Africa and She Code Africa Meetup - 9th August I gave a talk on writing good proposals for open source programs like Google Summer of Code, Outreachy, and Google Season of Docs.
